comment.author: 52491929@N00
comment._content:
I enjoyed viewing all the files posted in this group.  Excellent B & W photos and excellent description of the photos.  I enjoy photos of people iin their natural habitat, cloting, etc.  Always enjoy older school childred class photos - imagint the mothers worked hard to get their children theier best for the photos.  

In this photo, I believe the vehicle partially shown is a Mercury, due to the double moldings on side of front fender.  As photo made in '46, must be a new 46 moeld, due to glossy paint job.
